trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Longview
There were no other sightings in Longview on or around October 21st 2003
divs: Sighting Detailswhen I got home from hunting I was watching ch 12 news and mark nelson on the weather said one of his staf had seen somthing going acrost the sky and he would check it out. but never anouther word I know thay have film from there cams but thay never said a nouther word I wanted to call ch 12 and talk to him but I just blue it off. I thank you pepole could get ansers if you contacted ch 12 portland org.it was about 5 min I seen it till it disaperd north east off mt st helens it was about 1000 feet around and had a color of a harvest moon and even looked like one but much much biger.Iwas hunting it was almost dark I was heading out of the woods going east it was about 70 miles from me just west of mt st helen. I could not see st helens untill it past the mt it comepletley blocked the mt it was so big.I knew it was a ufo the sec I seen it I came home and told my girl frind she dident say much till she seen it on the news
Summary: Seen big object coming from Portland heading north east it looked like the moon but much much bigger.
